data.title: Van den Heuvel, Jules
data.text:
Activity

1908 - 1914 > Gand

Â° 16.11.1854; + 22.10.1926. University lecturer then professor in public law. Catholic politician, Minister of Justice, 1899-1907. Thereafter Minister of State, and finally Belgian Minister to the Holy See, 1915-1918. Still a member of the ABP in 1922.

Dates of creation/revision

SFJ new 5.9.2017; MD revised 10.5.2023
